in a Terminal, execute ssh-keygen

you should now have an ~/.ssh/id_dsa and an ~/.ssh/id_dsa.pub
now scp ~/.ssh/id_dsa.pub to your remote host(s)
so that would be scp ~/.ssh/id_dsa.pub user@host
